About Me

Joshua Cross is a marketing director, well versed in full-stack web-development. Throughout his professional career, Joshua has worked with industry leading companies all over the U.S., including MBA, NSAI, Brainfarm Cinema, Wolvvs Entertainment, Red Bull Media House, Highmark Health, S.C. Johnson, Starkist, H.G. Heinz, and Microsoft. He received a Bachelors of Business Administration from Belmont Universities' Massey School of Business,and a certificate of full-stack web-development from Vanderbilt's Owen's Graduate School of Business and Software Engineering. He has won awards for entrepreneurship and academic excellence and has an extremely well-rounded skillset.

Work

Portfolio Generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node

A dedicated Node.JS application that prompts a user for information about themselves and builds a fully-automated portfolio web-page.

View Project on GitHub

Motivation Manager

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery

If you struggle staying organized and task oriented, this digital planner is for you! Students, working professionals, and busy bees all benefit from the Motivation Manager! Using positive motivation, inspiring quotes, and time management to get you mentally prepared to achieve your daily goals. You can schedule important tasks, meetings, study materials/time, and development hours. Feel free to use the Grateful section, which shows your daily gratitude reminders. Use the Radar section for the tasks that don't require a specific time-table, but you would like to achieve that day.

View Project on GitHub
